thread.title: Oct. 24: Dress up, run Malt Monster 5K
thread.title_full: Oct. 24: Dress up, run Malt Monster 5K

title: Oct. 24: Dress up, run Malt Monster 5K
text:
Oct. 24: Dress up, run Malt Monster 5K Stephen Meyers , stephenmeyers@coloradoan.com 12:27 p.m. MDT October 23, 2015 Fort Collins Brewery’s Malt Monster 5K is Oct. 24. Proceeds from the benefit the FoCo Cafe. (Photo: Coloradoan library) 9 CONNECT 6 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Fort Collins Brewery hosts the Malt Monster 5K, with proceeds going toward the nonprofit restaurant FoCo Cafe. Cost for the 3.1-mile race is $35, which gets you a Fort Collins Brewery athletic bag filled with a pint glass, appetizers after the race and samples of the brewery’s Malt Monsters brews. Speaking of monsters, dress as your favorite one for a chance at winning the costume contest. Register at fortcollinsbrewery.com/malt-monster-5k . 
Don't forget to dress up as your favorite monster. Sign up ahead of time at www.fortcollinsbrewery. com. 
WHEN : 10 a.m., Oct. 24 
WHERE : Fort Collins Brewery, 1020 E. Lincoln Ave. Read or Share this story: http://noconow.co/1RND5kY TOP VIDEOS
